text: Sardar Abdur Rashid is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Patuakhali-1. ==Career== Rashid fought in Bangladesh Liberation war. His sisters, SM Monwara Monu and SM Anwara Anu, also fought in the war. He was elected to parliament from Patuakhali-1 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Mukti Bahini personnel Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sardar Abdur Rashid
